meanings.definition: Intended to convey or refer to (past tense of mean)
meanings.sent1: She meant to call her friend yesterday.
meanings.sent2: I meant to finish my homework before dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat meant to catch the mouse but got distracted by a butterfly.
meanings.sent4: His words meant to soothe her troubled mind.
meanings.sent5: The message was meant to be a secret, but it got leaked.

meanings.definition: Intended to do or achieve (past tense of mean)
meanings.sent1: He meant to study for the test, but he forgot.
meanings.sent2: They meant to surprise their mom with breakfast in bed.
meanings.sent3: The magician meant to pull a rabbit out of his hat, but a duck appeared instead.
meanings.sent4: Her actions meant to show her gratitude towards her mentor.
meanings.sent5: The goal was meant to be challenging, but achievable with effort.

meanings.definition: Intended to have a particular purpose or effect (past tense of mean)
meanings.sent1: The meant outcome of the experiment was to prove the theory.
meanings.sent2: The meant design of the building was to maximize natural light.
meanings.sent3: The mismatched socks were a meant fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: His meant comment sparked a lively debate among the group.
meanings.sent5: The meant silence in the room created a tense atmosphere.
